title: Visual Acuity
shortDescription: This test measures your ability to see fine details at different distances.
description: The test refers to the sharpness of vision, which is measured by your ability to discern letters or details at a specific distance.

testMode.touch: Tap or move the corresponding direction of the letter 'E'. If you cannot distinguish the letter, tap cannot see button.
testMode.voice: Say the corresponding direction of the letter 'E'. If you cannot distinguish the letter, say “Cannot see”.
testMode.smartwatch: Tap the corresponding direction of the letter 'E' at your smart phone screen. If you cannot distinguish, tap 'cannot see' button.

checkList: Remove your eye wears once you start the test.
Take hard contact lenses out 1 day before the test.
Check if the screen brightness is 100%.
howItWorks: • Test can be done by holding your phone or from a distance.

title: Astigmatism
shortDescription: This test helps in detecting astigmatism by measuring the distortion of vision.
description: This test helps you determine the direction of astigmatism and assess if your current lens prescription is correct.

testMode.touch: Tap the the line (1-12) directly that looks most clear. If you see all the lines clearly, tap ‘All lines same’.
testMode.voice: Say the the line of the number that looks most clear. Say ‘number 00’. If all the lines looks clear, say ‘All lines same’.
testMode.smartwatch: On your smartwatch, tap the number (1-12) of the clearest line on your smartphone. If all lines are equally clear, select ‘All lines same.’

checkList: Remove your eye wears once you start the test.
Take hard contact lenses out 1 day before the test.
Check if the screen brightness is 100%.
howItWorks: • Test can be done by holding your phone or from a distance.

title: Circular Motion
description: Enhance the range of motion and improve blood circulation around the eyes.
motivation: Let’s take a quick break and give your eyes some gentle movement!
finishTitle: Great job! You have completed the Eye Movement Exercise.
advice: For better results, repeat this exercise twice a day.

title: Blink Relaxation
description: Alleviate dryness and reduce eye tension with this effective technique.
motivation: Give your eyes a quick refresh!
finishTitle: Well done! Your eyes are more relaxed now.
advice: Try to incorporate frequent blinking throughout the day to reduce eye strain.

title: Color Game
description: Relieve eye discomfort caused by dryness and strain.
finishTitle: Nice work! You’ve completed the color coordination game.
advice: Practice this game daily to boost your focus and coordination.

title: Stretching
description: Stretch and relax your eyes muscles to improve comfort and reduce strain.
motivation: It’s time to give your eye muscles a nice stretch!
finishTitle: Good job! You’ve finished the stretching exercise.
advice: Incorporate stretching after long periods of screen time.
